item.title: USB Laser Guided Missile Launcher + API + Video surveillance with Motion Detection = FUN
item.description: Lately, I’ve had this plan of scaring anyone who comes near my computer while I’m in class.. Though this idea would only work once on the person walking by, it would still be quite hilarious to see. So here is my idea… Buy the USB Laser Guided Missile Launcher which comes with a set of API’s written in c#. I would then head to Wal-Mart and pick up a cheap web cam.

item.title: You are Beautiful
item.description: I just sat down and ate lunch and my mom was watching Extreme Makeover. I kept on seeing a pattern with what each wife’s husband told them when they were reunited. It was along the lines of “You are now beautiful”. When I was growing up I always got the impression that an individual “should” base their relationships not on looks but for whom they are compatible with. We all are pretty unique individuals, but a majority of men have one thing in common: looks come first and personality follows.
